creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: tall vase with a narrow base; mottled tan on top that fades into white and blue/black at bottom
medium: Iga ware; stoneware with natural ash glaze
text: Over the past several years, Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz have compiled a significant collection of primarily Japanese contemporary ceramics that they frequently lend to museums around the United States and Canada. Mia has received annual extended loans from the Horvitzs since 2010. This is their third gift to the museum, a selection of ten objects from among the more than one hundred they have lent over the years.
title: Large Iga-ware jar
